_sText:
#### **DE_GASOLINE**

Bomb/Defuse CS:S Map by [Av3ris](http://mappingbase.de/members/275-Av3ris) / Marco Wahler.

 Another nice viewed medium sized industrial-themed map with realistic high-detailed environment, good lightning and fascinating gameplay.
Outdoor and indoor areas are half-to-half presented here, and they reproduced a certain Oil Production Complex with some office buildings, underground corridors and two bomb-sites: The Central Control/Server Room (A) and The Drill/Pump Device (B).

 This is a beta, but it is absolutely playable and seems a bugs free. Friendly for mid- and low-range fightings.

 Overview, Radar and some other custom stuff are included in BSP-file. NOTE: NAV-file for Bots are included too, but it seems not hand-tuned (imho).

 Map was taking 2-nd Place in first official Mappingbase.de CS:S Mappingcontest (supported by BFHosting.com and ESL), which has ended October 2011.
 Results of Competition: _http://mappingbase.de/content/151-Contest-Ergebnisse_

 Map was once released Mart 2012 as a part of Mappingbase CS:S Mappingcontest Mappack 1 (Full Version).
 Mappack download page: _http://mappingbase.de/content/255-Mappingbase-Mappack_
 Direct download link: _http://download.gc-gaming.de/bashor/mappingbase/css_maps/Contest_2011_MB_Mappack.zip_

 Thanks for your viewings and feedbacks. Good Frags and Enjoy!

 P.S. Sorry my English, I am from Russia ;-)
